title: Could Alexander Okasio-Cortez claim that there are walls that cannot be built in the mountains?
subtitle: Republican Congressman Iowa, Steve King, shared Mimi's non-source, trying to make fun of his New York colleague.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: United States President Okasio Cortez once said, "All the technology in the world will not allow us to build a wall in the mountains."
